intro: Comatoglossum strictum, commonly known as the narrow-leaf comatoglossum, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is native to regions of southern Africa, particularly in South Africa and Namibia. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and narrow, linear leaves. Its flowers are small and clustered in dense heads, typically displaying a yellowish or greenish hue. Comatoglossum strictum is often found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments.
